last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 60
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Villegas brothers' empire comes crashing down, the fates of the Cali Cartel members and those associated with them unfold.

name: The Snitch Cartel: Origins
original_name: El cartel de los sapos: El origen
overview: In Cali during the '60s and '70s, two brothers juggle family, romance and the joint pursuit of a burning ambition: to rule Colombia's drug industry.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In 1978, the Villegas family gather for Christmas at their lavish home. But a flashback to 1955 reveals their humble beginnings and early struggles.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Alirio is punished for talking to the police. Nacho sees Alonso kissing Nora. While visiting Dayana, Emanuel finds a police sketch in her father's desk.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Col. Tirado investigates Nora, who confides in her sister-in-law. Leonardo works on setting up a front to cover his illegal business activities.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Leonardo sets in motion a plan to take over Jimmy's pharmacy. Emanuel shares his past with Dayana. Marlén visits Alonso to ask him about Alirio.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: When a promotion fails to force Col. Tirado to move away, Leonardo employs dirtier methods. Alonso receives bad news, and convinces Nora to visit him.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Stress takes a toll on Dayana, putting her relationship with her father to the test. Leonardo learns his brother has been hiding a secret from him.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Leonardo falls in love at first sight. Tired of her spouse's long work hours, Fabiola pays him a surprise visit. A mole infiltrates the Villegas family.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Emanuel devises a way to make more money from the taxi. Leonardo pursues Mayerly. Fabiola goes into labor early, forcing the stolen car out of hiding.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Tutor Simón expands Nora's horizons. Emanuel learns what his two Swiss customers do for a living. Baby Fabián's baptism reunites the Villegas brothers.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Nora joins a protest. Mayerly struggles to keep custody of her son. With Emanuel's help, the Chacos kidnap the two Swiss diplomats for ransom.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Officer Parra receives a tip that leads to an arrest. Alirio finds himself in dire straits. Kidnapping victim Hugo offers a bold proposal to Nacho.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Parra's interview with the kidnapping victim takes a surprising turn. Leonardo devises a plan to raise seed money for the Chacos' next business venture.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Emanuel is persuaded to visit his dying father. To get her son back, Mayerly reluctantly accepts help from Leonardo. Tirado reconnects with Dayana.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Leonardo, Nacho and Hugo travel to the U.S. to establish their distribution network. Tirado helps his daughter with her class project.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Fabiola searches for the gift she expected to receive from her husband. Tirado makes arrangements to help his daughter escape from her husband.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Simón unknowingly recruits the first group of drug mules. Emanuel visits Rosario for fortune-telling and advice. Leonardo finally wins Mayerly's heart.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Leonardo brings Mayerly to meet the family at his son's first birthday party, and later determines the future of Nora's love life.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: After an unexpected visit from a cop behaving suspiciously, Tirado investigates. Mayerly demands to be given her rightful place in Leonardo's family.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Leonardo decides to invest in the local people's welfare. Nora receives news about Simón. Emanuel offers Rosario a proposal.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Leonardo meets his competition, while Tirado hands the baton to Mackensey. Years later, Fabián proves to be a difficult child, and Hugo finds Wilmer.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: At his birthday party, Emanuel, receives a special gift from his brother. Alonso is released from prison and reconnects with the Villegases.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Leonardo learns Fabián stole money from him. Federico begins drinking the team's special water. A new hostess at Club Brisas catches Emanuel's eye.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Federico falls ill at soccer practice. Alonso pays a visit to Dayana. Parra questions the director of the newspaper that he's investigating.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Mackensey launches a raid on the newly arrived shipment in New York City. An act of bravery earns Alonso an important mission from Leonardo.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Gabriel warns Federico about Hugo. Fernando makes Nora a promise. Mackensey rattles Sullivan by giving him a new position.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Leonardo brings his brother to Club Brisas to meet the woman he's crazy about. Sullivan flees to Cali, while Alonso gets arrested in New York City.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: The Villegas family reunites for Christmas dinner, but an uninvited guest interrupts. Twelve years later, the family is split between Madrid and Cali.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Fabiola tries to hide the news from her mother-in-law and Cindy. Wilmer offers the only solution to prevent Leonardo from being extradited to the U.S.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: The promise of a monetary reward motivates two inmates. Leonardo offers a Spanish government representative a proposal. Fabián gives Cindy advice.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Cindy learns the truth about her boyfriend's uncle. When Agent Allen arrives in Madrid and learns Gallardo has disappeared, he becomes suspicious.

episodes.name: Episode 31
episodes.overview: Wilmer learns the plane is headed to the Bahamas and scrambles to contact his uncle before it's too late. Cindy receives a medical diagnosis.

episodes.name: Episode 32
episodes.overview: Emanuel makes arrangements with the prison in Cali to give Leonardo a warm welcome. Marlén calls a meeting of all the women in the family.

episodes.name: Episode 33
episodes.overview: Pablo Escobar asks the Cali Cartel to return a favor. Fabián realizes Cindy has fled. Leonardo comes to an agreement with his mother.

episodes.name: Episode 34
episodes.overview: Adelaida agrees to a date with "The German." Fabián starts his new job. Wilmer travels to Bogotá to prevent Leonardo's extradition to the U.S.

episodes.name: Episode 35
episodes.overview: As Wilmer and Constanza become closer, Cindy makes a surprising return to Cali. Leonardo receives an upsetting phone call from Pablo Escobar.

episodes.name: Episode 36
episodes.overview: Leonardo asks Rosario for a tarot reading. Hugo makes an alarming discovery in New York. A war ignites, bringing grave consequences to the Villegases.

episodes.name: Episode 37
episodes.overview: Mayerly reveals a secret to her daughter. Cindy's parents unexpectedly arrive in Cali. Fabián suddenly finds himself in danger at his heroin warehouse.

episodes.name: Episode 38
episodes.overview: Fabián's escape from the fire draws the gunmen's attention. Raquel makes a terrifying discovery. Leonardo attends the wake, where Nora lashes out.

episodes.name: Episode 39
episodes.overview: The new head of security captures the man who coerced Víctor. Constanza plans a special party. Fabián scrambles to come up with Jacinto's money in time.

episodes.name: Episode 40
episodes.overview: Constanza meets with pageant contestant Ana Elvira. Flaco nervously drives the car bomb to the Mónaco Building. Agent Allen arrives at Uriel's party.

episodes.name: Episode 41
episodes.overview: Judge Villa makes an intervention. Raquel watches the video tape that she stole from Uriel's office. Cindy learns what happened to her passport.

episodes.name: Episode 42
episodes.overview: Ana Elvira gets a call from Leonardo. Raquel is asked a shocking question by her new boss. The fixed soccer match brings trouble to the Villegas family.

episodes.name: Episode 43
episodes.overview: Fabián meets with Medellín's star soccer player. Adelaida is targeted by Pablo Escobar's men. Cindy attracts the attention of another man.

episodes.name: Episode 44
episodes.overview: "The German" abuses his power over Adelaida. Sabina demands his wife be safely removed from Medellín, giving Leonardo an idea for rescuing his daughter.

episodes.name: Episode 45
episodes.overview: A name that Rosario saw in her visions proves significant. At Sabina's house in Medellín, Sandoval and his men lie in wait for Pablo's thugs to arrive.

episodes.name: Episode 46
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of Adelaida's abduction, the Villegas family fractures. An assassination prompts Agent Allen to request a meeting with Wilmer.

episodes.name: Episode 47
episodes.overview: The Cali Cartel strike a deal with Ibarra. The Pepes surveil Hacienda Nápoles. Leonardo learns Mayerly is meeting Iriarte, and Ana Elvira has a new man.

episodes.name: Episode 48
episodes.overview: Wilmer learns Cindy is working with Fabián and checks on her in Cali. Leonardo has Iriarte rounded up for a chat. A shootout erupts at Hacienda Nápoles.

episodes.name: Episode 49
episodes.overview: Leonardo introduces Ana Elvira to his family. The Villegases punish Fabián and Cindy. Raquel witnesses firsthand some of the casualties of the drug war.

episodes.name: Episode 50
episodes.overview: Mayerly seeks refuge with Fabiola. Sandoval learns of Fabián's warehouse and decides to find out what's in there. Rosario takes a turn for the worse.

episodes.name: Episode 51
episodes.overview: Raquel tries to prevent Diana from walking into a trap, but Sandoval wants his men to follow Diana, knowing she'll be brought to Pablo Escobar.

episodes.name: Episode 52
episodes.overview: The Cali Cartel select a scapegoat to take the fall for the Copacabana tragedy. Constanza acts as a spy at the party in Cartago. Felipe crosses a line.

episodes.name: Episode 53
episodes.overview: Raquel goes to Medellín to investigate the prison where Pablo Escobar is being held. Sandoval spots Nacho partying with Fabián and becomes suspicious.

episodes.name: Episode 54
episodes.overview: When Search Bloc is reinstated, the Cali Cartel make a donation that proves key to a successful mission. Constanza secretly accepts Amparo's job offer.

episodes.name: Episode 55
episodes.overview: Sandoval learns Belalcázar is coming to arrest him. Wilmer heads north in search of Constanza. Raquel meets someone new at work.

episodes.name: Episode 56
episodes.overview: Gutiérrez raids the funeral home.  Wilmer seeks revenge against Corporal and Guadaña. Sandoval takes steps to maintain Leonardo's political power.

episodes.name: Episode 57
episodes.overview: When Cindy negotiates a deal with Gutiérrez, Fabiola decides to do the same. Leonardo tests Belalcázar's trust in his new informant.

episodes.name: Episode 58
episodes.overview: Wilmer receives an upsetting letter. Marlén hosts Christmas dinner, but it's much different from past years. Yaneth lures Belalcázar into a trap.

episodes.name: Episode 59
episodes.overview: Max spots Sandoval doing something suspicious. Fabián makes a deal with one of the inmates who's trying to kill him for a bounty.

episodes.name: Episode 60
episodes.overview: As the Villegas brothers' empire comes crashing down, the fates of the Cali Cartel members and those associated with them unfold.
